USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

--Este SP reemplaza la creación manual de la tabla externa para crearla de forma automatica desde un pipeline 
CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_vehicle
AS
BEGIN
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.vehicle') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle;  --si existe la tabla externa, la elimina

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle
        WITH (
            DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,             --https://entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/electric-vehicle-data/
            LOCATION = 'silver/vehicle',                    --carpeta donde se almacenará el resultado de la ingesta y transformacion de datos   
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format               --formato de salida de los datos (parquet)
        )
        AS
        SELECT vehicleId as vehicle_id, vin,                --seleccion de datos y transformaciones
                modelYear as model_year, make, model, 
                electricRange as electric_range, 
                baseMSRP as base_msrp, 
                vehicheTypeId as vehicle_type_id, 
                cafvEligibilityId as cafvEligibility_id,  
                CAST(
                    SUBSTRING(
                        vehicleLocation,
                        CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) + 2,
                        CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation, CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) +1) - CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) -1
                    ) AS FLOAT
                ) AS longitude,
                CAST(
                    SUBSTRING(
                        vehicleLocation,
                        CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation, CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) +1) +1,
                        LEN(vehicleLocation) - CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation, CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) +1) -1
                    ) AS FLOAT
                ) AS latitude
            FROM bronze.vehicle;
END
GO
